      the view that this belongs to

      internal reference to the view, for the original purpose of taking you back to the main menu.

      internal reference to the view
      Constructors in view with parameters of type GameWindow 
      Constructor and Description
      BackButton(GameWindow view, java.lang.String text)
      sets the text of the button, and the view that it refers to.
      BoardPanel(GameWindow window)
      Constructor uses some private helper methods to initialise the BoardPanel object, the helper methods: defineButtons(), addButtons() and addActionListner() deal with the buttons.
      MenuStartButton(GameWindow view, java.lang.String text)
      initialises the start button with some text and a view to operate on
      SideBar(GameWindow view)
      Takes a GameWindow(view) and creates the two labels and button
      StartMenu(GameWindow view)
      initialises two buttons and two combo boxes.
